title: Help please, account hacked havent heard anything for 5 days
body: for one im using my brothers account with his permission because the hack isnt allowing me to log in with mine. two i submitted a ticket regarding this on september 28th and still havent heard anything #23509005. its kind of ridiculous that its taking this long, and it feels like us lower players dont matter to you people. the user name on my account is thereub summoner name The Reub. please get ahold of me asap.

replies.body:
First off, regardless if you have permission from your brother, account sharing of **any kind** is against the [*Terms of Use*](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), so I strongly recommend against it.

Regarding your ticket, we've been pretty dang slammed with tickets as of late, so *response times are a bit higher than normal*. We'll have an account specialist get back to you as soon as possible, so I recommend being patient until then.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
